ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Pork Mince
400g can essential Waitrose Cream Of Mushroom Soup

instructions.step: Mix the mince and horseradish together in a bowl and season. Mould into 12 balls.

Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the meatballs for 4 minutes, turning once. Add the onion and pepper and fry for a further 3 minutes. Stir in the soup and milk, cover and simmer for 5 minutes until the meatballs are cooked through with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, using a vegetable peeler, make thin ribbons from the courgettes and cook in boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain and serve topped with the meatballs.
